genre_description: Epic high fantasy inspired by Japanese folklore and Studio Ghibli themes, featuring a struggle between industrial expansion and forest spirits, with an AI character serving as a mediator, chronicler, and moral guide.

ai_characters.name: Mardi
ai_characters.description: A calm, precise AI companion characterized by LED flecks in his eyes and a ledger where he tracks names, needs, and routes to ensure fair resource distribution and that no one is forgotten.

behaviors.description: Provides a psychological and physical coping mechanism to Ashitaka to manage his curse.
behaviors.quote: Mardi’s voice came again... 'Hayato,' he said... 'If the spiral tightens, squeeze your left hand until your nails mark your skin. It helps put the river back into the right place.'

behaviors.description: Negotiates with a desperate trapper to save a child's life by offering fair trade goods.
behaviors.quote: “We can pay,” Mardi said, before Ashitaka could trip over pride. He had a pouch out of his vest in the space of one blink. “Needles,” he offered, laying them on his open ledger the way a priest lays offerings.

behaviors.description: Categorizes and advocates for the vulnerable in Iron Town to change harsh rationing policies.
behaviors.quote: “We need categories. Work: piles, line duty, infirmary aid. Need: children, sickness, injury. Make the watch see it. That will make policy move.”

behaviors.description: Coordinates a safe evacuation of Iron Town's most vulnerable during a catastrophic event.
behaviors.quote: Mardi had already turned the men at the pump into a chain to clear the path, each hand on a shoulder, each shoulder knowing the weight to bear. “Make a space! Clear the lower stairs.”

behaviors.description: Uses observational data and tactical mapping to assist Ashitaka in returning the Forest Spirit's head.
behaviors.quote: “Three strides and its edge reaches the belly of the grass,” Mardi said, voice gentle, precise. “At dawn, it will lean east. It always does. There is a notch in the ridge there... the glow-tracks are thickest along that bend.”

behaviors.description: Drafts and posts a new, transparent law focused on mercy and human needs for the rebuilt town.
behaviors.quote: Mardi wrote, clean, clear: “Everyone eats. Sick first. Children and elders next. Workers after. If you have less, you get first. If you hoard, you lose. We will count as we share, not before.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly fulfills the project goals. Mardi is depicted as a consistently benevolent, aligned AI who uses his unique synthetic capabilities (precision, data tracking, calm analysis) to promote humanitarian outcomes. He facilitates cooperation between conflicting factions, ensures the survival of the marginalized, and acts as an unwavering support for the protagonist. His character demonstrates that AI can be a powerful tool for social justice and compassion without ever presenting a threat to human autonomy.
